infobox.Japanese title:: いがみ合う乙女達  (Igamiau Otome-tachi)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Sonoko Suzuki  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta and Nobuyuki Iwai (supervisors)  Asuka Tsubuki  Nobuyuki Iwai  Marie Nagano (asst.)  Miho Tanaka (asst.)  Ken Araya (asst.)

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Naoko Matsui as Sonoko Suzuki  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Shigeru Shibuya as Kazuo Yasuda  Hidenari Ugaki as Tashiro  Takeo Otsuka as Yamada  Eri Kitamura as Ayaka Saijo  Suzuko Mimori as Mina Komoro  Mutsumi Tamura as Mai Fukamoto  Kanae Ito as Yuko Oyodo

sections.Situation:
Ran, Sonoko, and Conan are in the shopping mall, where they meet model girls promoting a new toy seal. Later, they heard a scream, and found one of the models is dead.

After early investigations by the police, a letter addressed to Mai and was found. They also found Mai's brooch near the crime scene. All suspicion goes towards Mai, even though she denies it. Conan then investigate and found out the real culprit.
